title: Software Engineer - Lead
description:
about the role
This position will be responsible for Continuous Improvement (CI), ServiceNow automation, and optimization within Cybersecurity Operations. The role focuses on enhancing ServiceNow workflows, automating manual processes, and integrating ITSM/ITOM functionalities to drive efficiency. Key responsibilities include customizing ServiceNow modules, developing automation scripts, optimizing incident and change management workflows, and implementing integrations to streamline cybersecurity operations. The position plays a critical role in improving operational agility, reducing response times, and enhancing service quality through automation and innovation.
Key Activities / Deliverables
Develop and automate ServiceNow workflows to streamline incident, change, and request management.
Lead Continuous Improvement (CI) initiatives by identifying and automating repetitive or manual processes.
Customize and enhance ITSM/ITOM modules (e.g., Incident, Change, CMDB, Discovery) to support cybersecurity operations.
Implement and maintain integrations using REST/SOAP APIs and Integration Hub with external tools (e.g., monitoring, alerting).
Design dashboards and reports to improve visibility, operational tracking, and data-driven decision-making.
Collaborate with internal teams to gather requirements and deliver tailored SNOW solutions aligned with business needs.
Ensure platform stability and compliance with ServiceNow best practices and security standards.
about you
Required Skills:
ServiceNow Development: Proficient in scripting with JavaScript and Glide API within the ServiceNow platform.
Workflow Automation: Experience with Flow Designer, Business Rules, UI Policies, and UI Actions.
ITSM/ITOM Expertise: Strong understanding of Incident, Problem, Change Management, CMDB, Discovery, and Event Management modules.
API Integration: Hands-on experience with REST and SOAP APIs for system integrations.
CI/CD & DevOps Mindset: Familiar with ServiceNow updates, release management, and automation of deployment processes.
Analytical Thinking: Ability to identify improvement opportunities and design scalable automation solutions.
Collaboration & Communication: Strong interpersonal skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Process Orientation: Knowledge of ITIL best practices; ITIL 4 Foundation certification preferred.
Security Awareness: Understanding of cybersecurity operational needs and governance requirements.
Preferred Certifications:
ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) is must
ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD) is highly preferred.
ITIL 4 Foundation (preferred)
additional information
Global opportunities: Work in multi-national teams with the opportunity to collaborate with colleagues and customers from all over the world
Flexible work environment: Flexible working hours and possibility to combine work from office and home (hybrid ways of working)
Professional development: training programs and upskilling/re-skilling opportunities
Career growth: Internal growth and mobility opportunities within Orange
Caring and daring culture: health and well-being programs and benefits, diversity & inclusion initiatives, CSR and employee connect events
Reward programs: Employee Referral Program, Change Maker Awards

title: QA/QC Engineer
description:
Company Description
Egis is an international player active in architecture, consulting, construction engineering and mobility services. We create and operate intelligent infrastructures and buildings that respond to the climate emergency and contribute to more balanced, sustainable and resilient territorial development. Operating in 100 countries, Egis puts the expertise of its 19,500 employees at the service of its clients and develops cutting-edge innovations accessible to all projects. Through its wide range of activities, Egis is a key player in the collective organization of society and the living environment of citizens all over the world.
With 3,500 employees across 8 countries in the Middle East, Egis has delivered over 700 complex development projects, stimulating economic growth and enhancing quality of life. Ranked among the top ten firms in the Middle East by Engineering News Record (ENR), Egis is committed to sustainable development. The Group’s operations in the Middle East are built on strategic acquisitions and a deep understanding of local market conditions. Egis’ long history of providing comprehensive engineering, consulting, and project management services makes it a trusted partner for regional governments, investors, and developers.
Job Description
We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical QA/QC Engineer to join our team in Cairo, Egypt. In this critical role, you will be responsible for ensuring the highest standards of quality across our engineering projects, implementing robust quality assurance processes, and driving continuous improvement initiatives.
Develop, implement, and maintain quality assurance policies and procedures aligned with industry standards and company objectives
Conduct regular inspections and audits to ensure compliance with quality standards and specifications
Analyze quality data to identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to investigate and resolve quality issues, implementing corrective actions as needed
Prepare and maintain comprehensive quality assurance documentation, including reports, metrics, and performance indicators
Lead and participate in quality-related meetings and reviews with internal stakeholders and external partners
Train and mentor staff on quality control processes, best practices, and the use of quality assurance tools
Stay up-to-date with industry standards, regulations, and best practices in quality assurance and control
Contribute to the continuous improvement of quality management systems and processes
Ensure adherence to safety protocols and regulations in all quality-related activities
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, Civil, or related field)
Minimum of 7 years of experience in quality assurance and quality control within Rail projects
In-depth knowledge of quality management systems and standards, particularly ISO 9001
Certification in quality management (e.g., ASQ Certified Quality Engineer) preferred
Proficiency in statistical process control (SPC) techniques and quality assurance software tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on root cause analysis
Excellent understanding of engineering drawings, specifications, and technical documentation
Demonstrated ability to develop and implement quality assurance policies and procedures
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
Experience in conducting quality audits and inspections in engineering or manufacturing projects
Familiarity with relevant industry codes, standards, and regulations
Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and quality management software
Knowledge of lean manufacturing principles
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Fluency in English.
Egis Group

title: Site Reliability Engineer - Microsoft D365
description:
Department: Consumer & Customer Platform & Digital Factory, Digital & Technology Platform Services.
Location: Egypt, Cairo.
Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) for D365 is responsible for maintaining and improving the reliability, availability, performance, and scalability of the D365 platform and provided services. This includes designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure, tools, and processes necessary to support the platform operations. The SRE will work closely with development and operation teams, from the core D365 platforms as well as cross-platform ones, to ensure that the platform is scalable, secure, and highly available. SRE will also be responsible for monitoring the platform, identifying and resolving issues, and implementing improvements to prevent future incidents. The SRE will be expected to have a strong understanding of D365 Platform software engineering and systems operations, DevOps practices, and cloud infrastructure with a focus on automating operations and resolving complex technical challenges.
YOUR KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Availability & Performance Monitoring:
o Monitor D365 system health, availability, and performance to ensure services meet defined service-level objectives (SLOs) and service-level agreements (SLAs).Work on D365 system reliability engineering by designing and implementing system that is resilient, fault-tolerant, and capable of withstanding both expected and unexpected failures.
o Proactively identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues affecting the stability of the D365 platform and its integrations.
o Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting systems to provide visibility into D365 performance, application health, and user experience.
o Leverage observability tools (e.g., Azure Monitor, Application Insights, Power Platform Monitor, Dynatrace) to enhance real-time visibility into D365 services.
Problem Management & Root Cause Analysis:
o Lead troubleshooting efforts for complex issues (problems), diagnose root causes, and drive improvements to prevent recurrence in collaboration with Development teams and Product owner partners. Ensure proactive management of alerts and participation in crisis management teams as required
o Perform root cause analyses with the relevant Development & Operations teams to identify and resolve recurring issues, documenting findings, and driving systemic changes to prevent future failures. Lead post-incident reviews to document learnings, and work with teams to implement long-term fixes.
Automation & Continuous Improvement:
o Implement processes and practices that continuously improve the reliability, performance, and scalability of the system.
o Develop & maintain automations for repetitive tasks to increase efficiency, reduce manual effort, and improve response times.
o Improve with Developers, DevSecOps engineers CI/CD pipelines for D365 updates, ensuring that releases follow testing and quality assurance standards.
o Ensure D365 Platform can scale efficiently, meet growing user demand, and plan for future capacity needs.
Collaboration & Cross-Functional Coordination:
o Collaborate with D365 product development teams, Cloud operations, and other platform teams to define reliability requirements and prioritize improvement initiatives.
o Partner with the security team to implement best practices and maintain compliance within the D365 environment.
o Provide training and support to team members and users on incident response protocols, monitoring tools, and troubleshooting techniques.
o Share insights and best practices with other SREs to foster knowledge sharing and improve reliability across the organization.
Work with Central SRE or other Platform SREs, SIAM (Service & Integration Management) management team, and the SRE Community of Practice to leverage synergies and share best practices to ensure Operational Excellence.
ARE THESE YOUR SECRET INGREDIENTS?
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.
7+ years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or IT operations with a focus on application reliability and observability.
3+ years of experience with Microsoft D365 Sales, Customer Service or Field Services areas of B2B or B2C preferably in the FMCG industry, including understanding its architecture, configuration, and integrations.
Hands-on experience with D365 platform monitoring, alerting, and observability tools, especially within the Microsoft ecosystem (e.g., (Azure infra, azure functions, Azure service bus, Azure Event Hub, Application Insights, Power Platform tools).
Strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure, data structures and algorithms (Azure data factory), object-oriented programming (.NET, C#), front-end programming (custom PCF development), SQL, cloud development.
Desired understanding with automation and scripting languages (e.g. Python, or JavaScript) to streamline processes.
Experience with Azure DevOps CD/CI Pipelines (ALM)
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills, with a focus on improving long-term reliability and efficiency.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across cross-functional teams. Fluent in written and verbal English
Detail-oriented and capable of managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Fluent in English, with strong written and verbal communication skills.
Microsoft certifications related to Dynamics 365, Azure (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals, Azure Administrator).
ABOUT YOUR NEW TEAM:

Department: Consumer & Customer Platform & Digital Factory, Digital & Technology Platform Services.
Location: Egypt, Cairo.
Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) for D365 is responsible for maintaining and improving the reliability, availability, performance, and scalability of the D365 platform and provided services. This includes designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure, tools, and processes necessary to support the platform operations. The SRE will work closely with development and operation teams, from the core D365 platforms as well as cross-platform ones, to ensure that the platform is scalable, secure, and highly available. SRE will also be responsible for monitoring the platform, identifying and resolving issues, and implementing improvements to prevent future incidents. The SRE will be expected to have a strong understanding of D365 Platform software engineering and systems operations, DevOps practices, and cloud infrastructure with a focus on automating operations and resolving complex technical challenges.
YOUR KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Availability & Performance Monitoring:
o Monitor D365 system health, availability, and performance to ensure services meet defined service-level objectives (SLOs) and service-level agreements (SLAs).Work on D365 system reliability engineering by designing and implementing system that is resilient, fault-tolerant, and capable of withstanding both expected and unexpected failures.
o Proactively identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues affecting the stability of the D365 platform and its integrations.
o Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting systems to provide visibility into D365 performance, application health, and user experience.
o Leverage observability tools (e.g., Azure Monitor, Application Insights, Power Platform Monitor, Dynatrace) to enhance real-time visibility into D365 services.
Problem Management & Root Cause Analysis:
o Lead troubleshooting efforts for complex issues (problems), diagnose root causes, and drive improvements to prevent recurrence in collaboration with Development teams and Product owner partners. Ensure proactive management of alerts and participation in crisis management teams as required
o Perform root cause analyses with the relevant Development & Operations teams to identify and resolve recurring issues, documenting findings, and driving systemic changes to prevent future failures. Lead post-incident reviews to document learnings, and work with teams to implement long-term fixes.
Automation & Continuous Improvement:
o Implement processes and practices that continuously improve the reliability, performance, and scalability of the system.
o Develop & maintain automations for repetitive tasks to increase efficiency, reduce manual effort, and improve response times.
o Improve with Developers, DevSecOps engineers CI/CD pipelines for D365 updates, ensuring that releases follow testing and quality assurance standards.
o Ensure D365 Platform can scale efficiently, meet growing user demand, and plan for future capacity needs.
Collaboration & Cross-Functional Coordination:
o Collaborate with D365 product development teams, Cloud operations, and other platform teams to define reliability requirements and prioritize improvement initiatives.
o Partner with the security team to implement best practices and maintain compliance within the D365 environment.
o Provide training and support to team members and users on incident response protocols, monitoring tools, and troubleshooting techniques.
o Share insights and best practices with other SREs to foster knowledge sharing and improve reliability across the organization.
Work with Central SRE or other Platform SREs, SIAM (Service & Integration Management) management team, and the SRE Community of Practice to leverage synergies and share best practices to ensure Operational Excellence.
ARE THESE YOUR SECRET INGREDIENTS?
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.
7+ years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or IT operations with a focus on application reliability and observability.
3+ years of experience with Microsoft D365 Sales, Customer Service or Field Services areas of B2B or B2C preferably in the FMCG industry, including understanding its architecture, configuration, and integrations.
Hands-on experience with D365 platform monitoring, alerting, and observability tools, especially within the Microsoft ecosystem (e.g., (Azure infra, azure functions, Azure service bus, Azure Event Hub, Application Insights, Power Platform tools).
Strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure, data structures and algorithms (Azure data factory), object-oriented programming (.NET, C#), front-end programming (custom PCF development), SQL, cloud development.
Desired understanding with automation and scripting languages (e.g. Python, or JavaScript) to streamline processes.
Experience with Azure DevOps CD/CI Pipelines (ALM)
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills, with a focus on improving long-term reliability and efficiency.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across cross-functional teams. Fluent in written and verbal English
Detail-oriented and capable of managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Fluent in English, with strong written and verbal communication skills.
Microsoft certifications related to Dynamics 365, Azure (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals, Azure Administrator).

title: Operations Engineer – SAP Commerce Cloud
description:
Department: Consumer & Customer Platform & Digital Factory, Digital & Technology Platform Services.
Location: Egypt, Cairo.
The Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) - B2B Commerce is responsible for enhancing the reliability, performance, and scalability of customer-facing portal applications. This role emphasizes proactive incident analysis, automation, observability, and collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless customer experiences. As an SRE, you will work closely with product team, DevSecOps, and support teams to implement best practices in operational excellence, automation, and incident management within a complex, multi-cloud environment.
YOUR KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Proactive Incident Analysis & Operational Improvements:
o Analyze incident patterns and trends to gain insights into recurring issues, collaborating with product teams to drive their resolution.
o Proactively manage alerts, identify potential problems, and work with cross-functional teams to enhance reliability and performance.
o Collaborate with product teams to prioritize operational user stories focused on reliability and performance improvements.
o Document operational workflows and troubleshooting guides to support knowledge sharing and team efficiency.
Complex Troubleshooting & Problem Management:
o Lead efforts to troubleshoot complex issues in collaboration with L3 and L4 support partners, ensuring swift resolution and minimal downtime.
o Participate in crisis management and response, including on-call rotations, to address critical incidents impacting the customer portal.
Automation for Efficiency:
o Identify automation opportunities across operational tasks to improve efficiency and reduce manual workload.
o Collaborate with the cybersecurity team to integrate automated security enhancements into the portal's operations and infrastructure.
Observability and Monitoring:
o Use insights from observability tools to optimize incident resolution times, improve portal performance, and drive continuous improvement.
Cross-functional Collaboration:
o Work closely with architects, DevOps, and engineering teams to improve product stability and reduce incidents through proactive solutions.
o Engage with the Central SRE team, SIAM (Service & Integration Management) manager, and the SRE Community of Practice to share best practices and leverage synergies.
ARE THESE YOUR SECRET INGREDIENTS?
Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or Cloud operations within customer-facing solutions using an interoperable ecosystem based on SOA - SAP Commerce Cloud, SAP S/4, D365, Mirakl, big data, preferably in large scale, multinational enterprise.
Hands-on experience with complex technology stacks, including web and mobile applications, cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, Google Cloud), and databases.
Proficiency in automation and scripting (e.g., Python, PowerShell, or similar) for operational efficiency and incident response.
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices to streamline deployments and automate recovery processes.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure during incidents.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to coordinate across cross-functional teams.
Fluent in English, with strong written and verbal communication skills.
Relevant certifications in cloud platforms (e.g., Azure Solutions Architect, Web Administrator)
ABOUT YOUR NEW TEAM:
We are Coca-Cola Hellenic, a growth-focused consumer goods business and strategic bottling partner of the Coca-Cola Company. We bottle, distribute and sell an unrivalled range of products in 29 markets in Europe, Africa and Eurasia. As we do, we create value for all stakeholders, support socio-economic growth and build a more positive environmental impact.
We bring together more than 30,000 people from over 70 nationalities, coming from five continents. The diversity of our markets, from mature to emerging economies, provides a wide range of attractive opportunities for growth.
We nurture our talents. We give opportunities to people across all functions and levels, as well as different geographies, backgrounds and education. We are willing to take a risk on the people we believe in, even if they don't have the perfect experience. We have faith in what every person can be.

title: Assistant Manager / Manager - DevOps Engineer - Egypt
description:
At EY, we're all in to shape your future with confidence.
We'll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.​
Join EY and help to build a better working world.
The opportunity
As a DevOps Engineer in our Digital Engineering practice, you will be at the heart of how we build, test, and deploy modern software solutions. You will design and implement scalable, secure, and automated delivery pipelines, enabling high-performing engineering teams to move faster and with confidence. This is a hands-on, client-facing role that requires strong technical foundations, a passion for automation, and a commitment to continuous improvement.
Your key responsibilities
CI/CD Implementation: Design and maintain continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines to streamline development processes.
Infrastructure as Code: Develop and manage infrastructure using code to enable scalable and repeatable deployments.
Monitoring and Logging: Implement monitoring solutions to ensure system health and performance, and set up logging to facilitate issue diagnosis.
Security: Integrate security practices into the DevOps pipeline to ensure compliance and protect against threats.
Collaboration: Work closely with development and operations teams to understand their needs and provide support for deployment and troubleshooting.
Automation: Identify opportunities for automation within the development and deployment processes to increase efficiency.
Skills and attributes for success
Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced, collaborative team environment
Ability to travel in accordance with client and other job requirements
Excellent written and oral communication skills; writing, publishing and conference-level presentation skills a plus
To qualify for the role you must have
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical discipline
5-8 years in DevOps or platform engineering roles
Certifications such as AWS DevOps Engineer, Azure DevOps Expert, or Kubernetes Administrator are preferred
Experience working in agile and CI/CD environments
Key Skills:
Strong experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps)
Infrastructure-as-Code using Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible
Containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
Logging, monitoring, and alerting tools (Prometheus, ELK, CloudWatch)
Familiarity with DevSecOps practices and security tools
Domain/Industry Advantage:
Experience deploying and managing infrastructure for regulated industries (e.g., government, finance)
Familiarity with hybrid and multi-cloud environments
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting mindset
Effective communicator with developers, testers, and business teams
Attention to detail and focus on automation and quality
Comfortable with fast-changing priorities and agile delivery pace
What we look for
We seek a detail-oriented and proactive engineer with a strong background in system administration, networking, and cloud services. The ideal candidate will have experience with CI/CD tools, scripting languages, and infrastructure as code frameworks. A solid understanding of security best practices and the ability to work collaboratively across teams are essential. The candidate should be passionate about automation and continuous improvement, with a focus on delivering high-quality, reliable systems.
What We Offer You
At EY, we'll develop you with future-focused skills and equip you with world-class experiences. We'll empower you in a flexible environment, and fuel you and your extraordinary talents in a diverse and inclusive culture of globally connected teams. Learn .
Are you ready to shape your future with confidence? Apply today.
To help create an equitable and inclusive experience during the recruitment process, please inform us as soon as possible about any disability-related adjustments or accommodations you may need.
EY | Building a better working world
EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.
Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.
EY

Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: Senior Presales Engineer / Presales Consultant
description:
Job Description
- Designs highly technical solutions for the entire integrated solution components.
- Identifies the potential supplier(s) list for the provided solution(s).
- Acts as a consultant/advisor for the sales person and client in the complex technical issues and conducts presentations when required.
- Reviews the technical components of the proposals ensuring the efficient integration of all configured solutions before submission to the sales team for final compilation.
- Prepares technical write-up and associated drawings that describe the solution and highlight the advantages of the proposed solution.
- Studies the available solutions of the competitors to be able to provide the optimum solution emphasizing our strong points and hiding our weak points.
- Involve in customer meetings aimed to describe/discuss the proposed solution and highlight advantages over competitors.
Personal Skills
- Very good communications and presentations skills
- Good negotiations skills
- Very good command of English language
- Very good usage of Microsoft office products
Technical Skills
From 4 to 7 years Presales experience is essential
Experiences in one or more of the following solutions:
BI and Data AnalyticsWeb portals & Mobile Applications developmentIP Traffic Management (DPI)
Quality of Services measurements for CSP.Telecom Regulators business applications (e.g. Number Portability, Number management, CEIR, …)
Excellent pre-sales technical skills.
Excellent English and Arabic Business and Technical writing skills.
Giza Systems

title: Planning & Cost Control Engineer
description:
Job Description
This role is to support GSEC management in planning different activities and ensure proper synchronization to achieve targets.
Responsible for project timescale estimation and ensuring that the outlined deadlines are met by working closely and mainly with project management & procurement teams to ensure a project runs on schedule and that material supplies are sufficient.
Responsible for cost control for the running projects, coordinating with finance to ensure proper invoice and cash flow plan, and with procurement to ensure the proper procurement plan for all projects according to the project schedule & approved budgets.
- Planning for bidding activities to ensure all inputs are prepared and provided by different parties as per the bidding process.
- Track targets for activities based on each phase of a project plan and ensure they meet the client’s specifications.
- Understand project specifications and develop time schedules and budgets that meet them.
- Overlooking the overall master schedule, integrating revenues/cash plan/forecast, and actual figures.
- Preparing project budgets according to the approved P&L and following up on the budgeted cost items.
- Ensure to stay within the project each item cost budget and discuss each case with the relevant PM before action.
- Coordinate with the procurement team to have a master procurement plan synchronized with targets and report progress to the GSEC management team.
- Make comparisons between planned progress and actual progress, and report any differences to the project managers
- Report deviations recognized on the budget, prepare recovery plans, and seek management approval.
- Coordinate a master consolidated project CM plan synchronized with project schedules and report progress to the management team concerned.
- Analyze technical drawings and provide material and cost estimates.
- Ensure all projects are completed on time and within budget.
- Any other assigned management reporting required by the management team.
- Identify gaps in key performance areas and plan activities to increase overall project efficiency.
- Provide guidance and deliver schedules to facilitate the project execution strategy.
- Overlooking the overall master schedule, integrating revenue plan/forecast, and actual figures.
- Preparing project budgets according to the approved P&L and following up on the budgeted cost items.
- Ensure to stay within the project each item cost budget and discuss each case with the relevant PM before taking action.
- Report deviations recognized on the budget, prepare recovery plans, and seek management approval.
- Follow up on cost control processing to optimize the cash out and report budget issues.
- Updating the budget, margin & invoices and comparing them with the baseline.
- Coordinate a master consolidated project CM plan synchronized with project schedules and report progress to the management team concerned.
Personal Skills
Good analytical thinking.
Strong attention to detail.
Good time management.
Clear communication skills.
Technical Skills
Excellent in Primavera for project planning and scheduling.
Excellent in Microsoft Excel for cost control, data analysis, and reporting.
Skilled in Project Budgeting and Cost Estimation.
Proficient in Monitoring Progress and preparing S-curves and Cash Flow Forecasts.
Familiar with Earned Value Management (EVM).
Experience in Preparing and Updating Baseline Programs.
Education
Bachelor of Engineering with a Specialization in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
Giza Systems

title: Sr Engineer, Software Developer
description:
Who are we and what we stand for?
Our purpose and mission are what guides us and represents our promise to all our stakeholders – customers, partners, employees, influencers, shareholders, and communities.
Schneider’s purpose is to create Impact by empowering all to make the most of our energy and resources, bridging progress and sustainability for all. At Schneider, we call this Life Is On.
Our mission is to be the trusted partner in Sustainability and Efficiency.
Our renewed purpose highlights our commitment to create lasting impact while maintaining our promise to make the most of our energy and resources bridging progress and sustainability for all.
Our updated mission continues to reinforce our value of strong partnerships, where trust is needed above all.
About the role
Are you ready to be part of a team that’s driving innovation and transforming the digital landscape? At Schneider Electric, our global Digital Transformation Team is at the forefront of developing cutting-edge Global Custom Apps and Analytics solutions, including AI, BI, and RPA.
Your Role – Magic happens when you bring great people together!
Develop & Maintain: Create and sustain complex web applications using .NET MVC Core for the backend and React for the frontend.
Craft Exceptional UIs: Utilize your expertise in React to design user interfaces that captivate and engage users, ensuring a seamless experience across devices.
Collaborate & Innovate: Work within an Agile Scrum team, partnering closely with other developers, Business Analysts, Product Owners, and Scrum Masters to deliver high-quality, high-performing, and globally scalable business-critical applications
Backend Responsibilities (.NET MVC Core):
Design, develop, and implement robust and secure backend services using ASP.NET MVC Core with C#.
Architect scalable backend solutions to manage high traffic and complex data needs.
Efficiently manage data persistence through databases like SQL Server and MongoDB.
Implement business logic with a focus on security and performance.
Develop comprehensive unit tests and integration tests, while documenting APIs and code for maintainability.
Frontend Responsibilities (React Expert):
Design and maintain exceptional user interfaces using React.js and modern frontend libraries/frameworks (e.g., Redux, React Router, Material-UI).
Champion best practices in frontend development, ensuring code reusability and component-based architecture.
Create pixel-perfect, responsive interfaces that deliver a flawless user experience.
Write clean, maintainable JavaScript code and collaborate with designers to bring UI mock-ups to life.
Integrate frontend components with backend APIs using REST and Graph API techniques, and conduct unit testing to ensure stability
Qualifications
About You
· Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
· Experience: 3-6 years of relevant experience as a Sr. Engineer or Software Developer.
· Strong hands-on experience with .NET MVC Core (C#) and React.js.
· In-depth knowledge of React best practices and object-oriented programming (OOP) principles.
· Experience in building REST APIs or Graph APIs and working with relational and NoSQL databases.
· Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
· Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
· Experience with JIRA is a plus!
Schneider Electric

title: Integration Engineer Lead
description:
Job Description:
700Apps is on the lookout for an Integration Engineer Lead who will spearhead our integration projects and ensure seamless connectivity between various systems and applications. In this role, you will lead a team of talented integration engineers, guiding them in the design, implementation, and maintenance of robust integration solutions that enhance our operations and improve data flow across the organization.
Key Responsibilities:
Lead and mentor a team of integration engineers, providing technical direction and support, while promoting a collaborative work environment.
Design and implement innovative integration solutions that utilize modern API strategies and middleware technologies.
Work closely with stakeholders to understand integration requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs effectively.
Oversee the testing and deployment of integration projects, ensuring quality assurance and performance optimization.
Monitor and troubleshoot integration processes, addressing issues that arise and implementing solutions swiftly.
Research and stay informed about industry trends and best practices regarding integration technologies.
Document integration processes and maintain accurate records of system interactions and workflows.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in integration engineering or a similar role, with a strong emphasis on team leadership.
In-depth knowledge of integration methodologies and technologies, such as RESTful APIs, SOAP services, and ETL processes.
Experience with cloud-based integration platforms like AWS, Azure, or IBM Cloud.
Proficiency in programming languages, including Java, Python, or C#.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically under pressure.
Able to communicate complex technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience with Agile development methodologies is a plus.
Familiarity with data governance and integration monitoring tools.
Benefits:
Private Health Insurance
Training & Development
Attractive Salary
Social Insurance
Family Package
700Apps

Lead and mentor a team of integration engineers, providing technical direction and support, while promoting a collaborative work environment.
Design and implement innovative integration solutions that utilize modern API strategies and middleware technologies.
Work closely with stakeholders to understand integration requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs effectively.
Oversee the testing and deployment of integration projects, ensuring quality assurance and performance optimization.
Monitor and troubleshoot integration processes, addressing issues that arise and implementing solutions swiftly.
Research and stay informed about industry trends and best practices regarding integration technologies.
Document integration processes and maintain accurate records of system interactions and workflows.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in integration engineering or a similar role, with a strong emphasis on team leadership.
In-depth knowledge of integration methodologies and technologies, such as RESTful APIs, SOAP services, and ETL processes.
Experience with cloud-based integration platforms like AWS, Azure, or IBM Cloud.
Proficiency in programming languages, including Java, Python, or C#.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically under pressure.
Able to communicate complex technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience with Agile development methodologies is a plus.
Familiarity with data governance and integration monitoring tools.
Benefits:
Private Health Insurance
Training & Development
Attractive Salary
Social Insurance
Family Package

title: AI Pre-Sales Engineer
description:
About Velents
Velents is an AI-powered recruitment platform that automates the hiring process from candidate screening to assessment, including AI video interviews, skill evaluations, and data-driven decisions. Trusted by strategic ministries in KSA .
Job Role
The Pre-Sales Engineer with AI expertise acts as a technical bridge between the sales team and potential clients, providing in-depth technical knowledge and expertise in AI-driven solutions. This role involves understanding customer challenges, designing tailored AI-powered solutions, and delivering compelling technical presentations and demonstrations.
Key Responsibilities
Non-stop learning, daily reading about the new updates in the AI field
Collaborate with the sales team to identify and understand customer challenges that can be addressed using AI technologies.
Design and propose AI-driven technical solutions tailored to client needs, such as predictive analytics, machine learning models, AI-powered automation, and data insights.
Create and deliver technical architecture documents, including AI workflows, data pipelines, and integration strategies.
Conduct AI solution demonstrations, highlighting features like machine learning capabilities, data visualization, and automated decision-making processes.
Act as a trusted advisor, educating clients on AI technologies, their potential applications, and ROI benefits.
Address technical queries about AI implementation, data requirements, scalability, and customization options.
Assist in preparing detailed technical proposals, particularly for AI-focused projects.
Respond to RFPs/RFIs with an emphasis on AI-driven functionalities and implementation strategies.
Work closely with data scientists, AI engineers, and software developers to ensure proposed AI solutions are feasible and scalable.
Provide feedback to AI product teams based on client requirements and emerging market trends.
Deliver training to internal teams and clients on AI concepts, tools, and solution workflows.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of the latest AI trends, technologies, and tools (e.g., machine learning frameworks, NLP, computer vision).
Collaborate with AI development and implementation teams to ensure smooth deployment of AI solutions.
Support the transition by providing technical documentation, including datasets, model training notes, and integration guides.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
3–5+ years in a pre-sales, solutions architect, or technical consulting role with a focus on AI or machine learning solutions.
Hands-on experience with AI technologies, frameworks, and platforms.
Ability to deploy opensource modules or connect to remote machines.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, especially in AI solution design.
Exceptional communication skills to explain complex AI concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to manage high-level discussions and guide clients through AI adoption processes.
Velents

title: Public Cloud operation Engineer
description:
about the role
A Cloud Implementation Engineer shares responsibility in the implementation, operation and management of Flexible Engine Cloud infrastructure. The Cloud Operation Engineer uses a strong understanding of all aspects of a cloud centered data center both on a physical level and virtual level, and the ability to troubleshoot, identify and resolve very complex problems in a timely and professional manner. The role also requires strong execution and focus to meet the needs of our Cloud customers.
Duties and Responsibilities:
Requirements – Education, Skill & Abilities:
Recommend technical solutions that will enhance performance, increase redundancy, and add flexibility to the existing infrastructure.
implement new services/ features in pre-prod and prod environments
Quickly turn business problems into technical solutions.
Manage configurations and the deployment of equipment in compliance with established technology policies.
Implement new changes and services on prod and preprod environment and validate the changes meet our standards and criteria.
Document all the steps involved during the changes and be able to do any requested documents and guides of the changes as needed.
Interact with other team members to offer assistance in troubleshooting, and knowledge transfer activities
Regular participation in change control activities that comply with ITIL change management.
Build solution and scripts that enhance the function of our site and help operate and maintain our infrastructure.
about you
Basic Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field or 4+ years of experience in a technical position.
2+ years of experience in system administration/cloud implementation.
Excellent knowledge on openstack cloud platform and its different services.
Fluency in English in Both writing and Speaking , French is a plus.
Ability to communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing, with customers.
Critical thinking skills, problem solving aptitude.
Accountability, commitment and having a sense of urgency
- Advanced experience in routing & Switching protocols (BGP, VPN, OSPF, STP, LACP, Stacking)
- CCNP R&S , HCNP Level
Advanced experience in Linux operating systems (RedHat/CentOS ,SUSE,,,,)
Advanced experience in storage systems (block ,object and file )
Experience in implementing and operating OpenStack Platform
Experience in implementing and operating virtualization technologies (vmware ,Xen and KVM)
Good knowledge of AWS services
Good knowledge of Application and database servers like ( Apache, Nginx, HAProxy, MySQL, MongoDB )
Good understanding of Continuous integration/delivery concepts ( Ansible, Jenkins )
good knowledge of basic networking concepts
good knowledge of python scripting
Basic knowledge of Linux Containers ( Docker ,Kubernetes )
Basic knowledge of monitoring solutions (Zabbix/Nagios)
Preferred Qualifications
Experience in implementing large-scale cloud infrastructure.
Excellent network analysis fundamentals and robust troubleshooting skills.
Excellent interpersonal skills and able to work as a productive member of a team Ability to coordinate multiple tasks simultaneously.
Demonstrated capability to achieve results under pressure. Manages time effectively and according to priorities.
Experience working on geographically dispersed team.
Solid knowledge of AWS public cloud and its different services.
Proven experience in Layer 3 technologies, including IPv4, BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, IPv6, HSRP, and VRRP.
Proven experience in working with Network Technologies including: VRF, MPLS, IPsec, and BVPN.
Demonstrated proficiency in network administration (DNS, BGP, Proxy, Load Balancing)
Implementing appropriate security, and monitoring tools for cloud networks.
Understanding of firewall concepts and rules.
Deep understanding of cloud technologies, such as
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS),
Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS),
Software-defined networks (SDN),
Network Functions Virtualization (NFV).
Open Virtual Switch
OpenStack Neutron (DVR)
Linux system administration experience which includes:
Linux performance tuning
Linux kernel's networking stack
Linux Namespaces
Linux Load balancer
Linux Virtual Server
HAProxy
Scripting/Programming experience
Ansible
GIT
additional information
At least 2 years of management experience.
At least 3 years of IT/Network/cloud operation technical experience.
At least 2 years of practice in an ITIL managed activity.
department

Our extensive experience and knowledge in global communication solutions, together with our understanding of multinational business and local support in 166 countries and territories, ensure that our customers receive a consistent, global solution wherever they do business

title: Public Cloud operation Engineer PaaS
description:
about the role
A Cloud Implementation Engineer shares responsibility in the implementation, operation and management of Flexible Engine Cloud infrastructure. The Cloud Operation Engineer uses a strong understanding of all aspects of a cloud centered data center both on a physical level and virtual level, and the ability to troubleshoot, identify and resolve very complex problems in a timely and professional manner. The role also requires strong execution and focus to meet the needs of our Cloud customers.
Duties and Responsibilities:
Requirements – Education, Skill & Abilities:
Recommend technical solutions that will enhance performance, increase redundancy, and add flexibility to the existing infrastructure.
implement new services/ features in pre-prod and prod environments
Quickly turn business problems into technical solutions.
Manage configurations and the deployment of equipment in compliance with established technology policies.
Implement new changes and services on prod and preprod environment and validate the changes meet our standards and criteria.
Document all the steps involved during the changes and be able to do any requested documents and guides of the changes as needed.
Interact with other team members to offer assistance in troubleshooting, and knowledge transfer activities
Regular participation in change control activities that comply with ITIL change management.
Build solution and scripts that enhance the function of our site and help operate and maintain our infrastructure.
about you
Basic Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field or 4+ years of experience in a technical position.
2+ years of experience in system administration/cloud implementation.
Excellent knowledge on openstack cloud platform and its different services.
Fluency in English in Both writing and Speaking , French is a plus.
Ability to communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing, with customers.
Critical thinking skills, problem solving aptitude.
Accountability, commitment and having a sense of urgency
Preferred Qualifications
Experience in implementing large-scale cloud infrastructure.
Excellent network analysis fundamentals and robust troubleshooting skills.
Excellent interpersonal skills and able to work as a productive member of a team Ability to coordinate multiple tasks simultaneously.
Demonstrated capability to achieve results under pressure. Manages time effectively and according to priorities.
Experience working on geographically dispersed team.
Solid knowledge of AWS public cloud and its different services.
Proven experience in Layer 3 technologies, including IPv4, BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, IPv6, HSRP, and VRRP.
Proven experience in working with Network Technologies including: VRF, MPLS, IPsec, and BVPN.
Demonstrated proficiency in network administration (DNS, BGP, Proxy, Load Balancing)
Implementing appropriate security, and monitoring tools for cloud networks.
Understanding of firewall concepts and rules.
Deep understanding of cloud technologies, such as
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS),
Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS),
Software-defined networks (SDN),
Network Functions Virtualization (NFV).
Open Virtual Switch
OpenStack Neutron (DVR)
Linux system administration experience which includes:
Linux performance tuning
Linux kernel's networking stack
Linux Namespaces
Linux Load balancer
Linux Virtual Server
HAProxy
Scripting/Programming experience
Ansible
GIT
additional information
At least 2 years of management experience.
At least 3 years of IT/Network/cloud operation technical experience.
At least 2 years of practice in an ITIL managed activity.

title: Senior Security Solutions Engineer - Firewall and SASE
description:
about the role
Orange Cyberdefense; a leading European Managed Security Services Provider, that supports business globally, is the strategic entity of the Orange Group dedicated to digital security that puts today's most pressing cyber security challenges at the heart of its brand. Our mission is to build a more secure digital society.
We support companies of all sizes, critical organisations, government agencies, and local authorities in the design, implementation, and operational management of their cyber security strategies. We provide them with our expertise to ensure the best level of protection for their data, their equipment, and the services they offer to their customers or their constituents.
With a share capital of more than 838 million euros in 2021 and more than 2500 experts dedicated to cyber security, we are today the European leader in the cyber defense market, and we need someone to help us tell the stories that matter most to our customers
In a fast-changing and challenging digital environment, the Security Solutions Engineering Team is seeking a Security Solutions Engineer specialising in Next Generation Firewalls (NGFW) and Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) at Orange CyberDefense. Your core responsibility is to design, develop, and implement advanced security solutions. You play a crucial role in ensuring the integrity and effectiveness of cybersecurity measures for our clients.
Your roles and responsibilities will be as follows:
Design and develop next-generation firewall (NGFW) and Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) security solutions for Orange CyberDefense customers.
In lab design and testing of overall architecture and components.
Develop and execute test plans.
Perform systems integration across multiple platforms
Provide Operations, Pre-sales, Sales, and Marketing with the appropriate support, documentation and training and lead them during the rollout and deployment
Perform operational-like tasks during pilot phases to assist operations.
Test and validate new features for customised and generic solutions in the lab based on specifications.
Design and test complex customer security solutions and architectures.
Work closely with Customer Solutions, Professional Services, Service Delivery, and Operations to design and support security solutions and, on critical strategic occasions, directly with Orange's customers.
Provide Level 3 Operational support for security teams.
Identify and raise risks to management regarding the current service and future enhancements when necessary.
about you
Education, Qualifications, and Certifications:
Engineering Degree in Computer, Communication, Electronics, MIS or equivalent experience.
Information security certifications (CISSP, CISA, CISM, etc.) are a plus.
Professional Experience:
At least 5 years of IT/network operation technical experience.
At least 4 years of experience in managing network and security infrastructures.
Experience in an ITIL-managed activity is a plus.
Very good understanding of networking (e.g. TCP/IP, routing, and switching) and
Very good understanding of network traffic security concepts & products
In-depth experience with some of the following NGFW and SSE/SASE capabilities and configurations:
Palo Alto Firewalls.
Fortigate firewalls.
SSE/SASE solutions (e.g. Zscaler, Palo Alto Prisma Access, Netskope, Fortigate SASE, Cisco Umberella, Microsoft Entra) and concepts (e.g. SWG, ZTNA, CASB)
Tunnelling protocols (e.g. SSL/TLS, IPSec, GRE)
Remote user access technologies
Cisco/Juniper switches
Troubleshooting skills using Wireshark or Fiddler.
Cloud technologies (Azure or AWS) are a plus.
Python scripting skills is a plus
Hands-on experience in evaluating specifications, lab validating, & testing.
Excellent communication and time management skills.
Hands-on experience in analyzing architecture and building proposals.
Ability to write technical documentation for operations, pre-sales, sales, & marketing.
Excellent English is a must, and French is a plus
additional information
.
department
Global Delivery & Operations
Orange Business manages and integrates the complexity of international communications, freeing our customers to focus on the strategic initiatives that drive their business. Our extensive experience and knowledge in global communication solutions, together with our understanding of multinational business and local support in 166 countries and territories, ensure that our customers receive a consistent, global solution wherever they do business
contract
Regular
Orange

title: n8n Integration Engineer
description:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
We are seeking a skilled and motivated n8n Integration Engineer with medium-level front-end capabilities to develop and maintain system integrations. In this role, you will work with APIs, webhooks, and third-party services to streamline and automate business processes. If you have a passion for building seamless integrations and solving complex workflow challenges, we’d love to hear from you!
IN THIS ROLE, YOU WILL
Design, develop, and maintain integrations using the n8n platform.
Analyze third-party system APIs, webhooks, and data structures to ensure seamless connectivity.
Develop and optimize REST API and GraphQL requests for effective communication between systems.
Implement and maintain workflow automation sequences based on business needs.
Troubleshoot and debug integration issues, ensuring reliability and efficiency.
Research and implement best practices for integration, security, and scalability.
Document technical specifications, workflows, and best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify integration needs and provide solutions.
IF YOU ARE
Medium-level JavaScript knowledge.
Nice to have Python knowledge.
TypeScript knowledge.
Experience with REST APIs and GraphQL, including making API requests and handling responses.
Understanding of webhooks and event-driven architectures.
Strong ability to analyze third-party APIs and data structures for integration.
Experience or willingness to learn n8n for workflow automation and integrations.
Ability to design and build sequence flows and workflows efficiently.
Proactive approach to researching and implementing solutions in unknown technical areas.
Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts clearly.
Proficient in written and spoken English.
Experience in writing technical documentation of workflows and integrations.
AS AN OPINOV8R, YOU WILL HAVE
— Digital-First Approach: Great talent knows no borders! You can work from wherever you are. We hire and collaborate with professionals worldwide.
— Remote Work Model: Balance your professional and personal life with our flexible working conditions. We offer an, empowering you to be productive and deliver your best from anywhere.
— Exciting Projects: Dive into impactful projects across various industries that challenge and spark your creativity. Work on innovative solutions that push boundaries, giving you the chance to make a difference and drive change.
— Boost Your Expertise: Elevate your career with unmatched experiences that expand your knowledge and master skills. We foster continuous learning and development opportunities that allow you to grow and reach new heights.
— Join the Best Team Ever: Collaborate with our diverse and сross-cultural team of passionate technologists and creative thinkers who inspire and support. Together, we develop services that make a real impact on the world.
HOW’S THE HIRING PROCESS GOING
We strive to make a smooth and transparent hiring process to find the perfect match for both sides. Steps may differ depending on the position — here’s what to expect:
— Initial Interview: If your background fits the role’s criteria, we’ll invite you for an interview with a Talent Acquisition Specialist to get to know you better.
— Technical Interview: Depending on the role, you may be asked to complete a technical assessment/test task to showcase your expertise.
— Final Decision: After completing all interviews and assessments, we’ll reach a final decision and get back to you with the result.

title: Planning Engineer Work In Saudi Arabia
description:
The Planning Engineer is responsible for developing, monitoring, and updating project schedules for both infrastructure and building projects. The role ensures that all project activities are planned efficiently and executed on time, within budget, and according to specifications. This includes coordination with project teams, consultants, and subcontractors to track progress, analyze delays, and propose recovery strategies.
Key Responsibilities:
Prepare and maintain detailed project schedules (baseline, updated, and revised).
Develop and integrate infrastructure and building timelines into the overall master schedule.
Monitor project progress and update schedules based on actual site performance.
Analyze critical paths and highlight risks or delays with mitigation recommendations.
Prepare weekly and monthly progress reports with earned value analysis (EVA).
Collaborate with project managers, site engineers, and subcontractors for data collection and validation.
Identify potential issues in resource planning and propose corrective measures.
Ensure alignment between cost-loaded schedules and actual project execution.
Assist in claims and delay analysis documentation.
Support tendering teams by preparing preliminary schedules and resource estimations.

title: Mid QC Engineer
description:
Job Description:
Objectives of this Role
The QC Mid will be responsible for conducting quality control activities within the software development team, ensuring that products meet quality standards and specifications. This position is typically offered full-time and reports to QC Lead. Those well-suited to this career enjoy problem-solving and working collaboratively with others.
Daily and Monthly Responsibilities
Test Execution: Execute test cases and scripts, identifying and documenting defects.
Test Planning: Assist in the creation of test plans and test strategies based on project requirements.
Defect Tracking: Track and report on the status of defects using the designated defect tracking tools.
Collaboration: Collaborate with the development team and other stakeholders to resolve defects and ensure the timely delivery of high-quality products.
Test Documentation: Create and maintain test documentation, including test cases, test scenarios, and test data.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in engineering, science or information technology, or equivalent education and work experience.
+ 2 years of expeience.
Professional certification, such as ISTQB-CTFL ISTQB-CTAL
Experience in manaual and automation testing
Prefer experience in performance testing (Jmeter)
Strong understanding of quality control methodologies and processes.
Experience in executing test cases and documenting defects.
Knowledge of software development life cycle and agile methodologies.
Ability to collaborate effectively with team members and stakeholders.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong attention to detail and quality.
Experience with defect tracking tools.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

title: RAID Support Engineer
description:
Advansys is a dynamic solutions provider focused on delivering smart, modular, and sustainable technology solutions that enhance operations, improve customer experiences, and drive business modernization. With over 400 skilled engineers, we serve 100+ enterprise customers across 14 countries. Specialized in a wide array of premium services including Business Automation, Industrial Digitization, Low code Development, Cloud Services, Warehouse Automation & Strategic Outsourcing.
Founded in 2014, Advansys is part of the INTRO Group, a private conglomerate established in 1980 with diverse investments across different business areas, oil and gas, real estate, specialized engineering, financial investment, Food & manufacturing.
We are looking for an experienced RAID Support Engineer who will be responsible for maintaining and troubleshooting our data management systems. In this role, you will provide support for complex SQL & PL/SQL issues, help with the performance tuning of Apache Spark jobs, monitor and manage Hive DB, and assist with Python-based automation and scripting. You will work closely with internal teams to ensure system availability, reliability, and optimal performance.
Job description:
Provide technical support for RAID-related systems, resolving issues related to SQL & PL/SQL queries, Hive DB, Apache Spark jobs, and Python automation.
Monitor system performance and proactively identify areas for optimization in data pipelines, SQL queries, and Spark jobs.
Troubleshoot issues related to data systems, including Spark jobs, Hive DB, and SQL/PLSQL processes, ensuring minimal downtime.
Work with the development and data engineering teams to implement bug fixes, performance enhancements, and system upgrades.
Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.
Support data integrations, ETL processes, and workflows, ensuring they run efficiently across systems.
Assist in the automation of common support tasks using Python scripting and SQL automation.
Manage and troubleshoot issues with distributed data processing platforms like Apache Spark, ensuring data jobs are running as expected.
Document incidents, troubleshooting steps, and solutions to create knowledge base articles for internal teams.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Data Engineers, Analysts, and Developers to provide timely and effective support.
Assist with deployments and system upgrades, ensuring minimal disruption to ongoing operations.
Requirements
Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Kafka, etc.).
Experience with Linux
Knowledge of data warehousing and data storage solutions.
Experience in creating automated reports and performance metrics.
Previous experience in customer-facing support roles or IT support engineering.
To Apply Please submit your resume!
Advansys
requirements: Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Kafka, etc.).
Experience with Linux
Knowledge of data warehousing and data storage solutions.
Experience in creating automated reports and performance metrics.
Previous experience in customer-facing support roles or IT support engineering.
Advansys

title: Senior Engineer
description:
Job Description
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Engineer in Digital Platforms Operations. The ideal candidate will have extensive expertise in managing and optimizing enterprise-level infrastructure, cloud-based platforms, and security systems. The role demands a high degree of proficiency across various technologies, including Windows and Linux servers, virtualization, databases, email/collaboration platforms, security, and backup solutions. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in ensuring the stability, security, and performance of our digital platforms, focusing on automation, containerization, and network security.
Server Administration (Windows & Linux):
Windows Server Management: Administer and manage Windows Server environments (2012-2022), including Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, Group Policy, IIS, and file services.
Linux Server Administration: Configure, maintain, and troubleshoot Linux-based servers (RHEL, Ubuntu, CentOS, etc.) across development, staging, and production environments.
System Optimization: Monitor, tune, and enhance server performance. Ensure high availability, load balancing, and failover mechanisms are in place for critical systems and applications.
Virtualization Management: Oversee and manage virtualization platforms such as VMware, Hyper-V, and Cloud infrastructure Openstack.
Design and implement virtual environments, ensuring scalability, high availability, and efficiency.
Storage Solutions:
Manage enterprise storage systems, including SAN, NAS, and object storage.
Configure and maintain storage solutions ensuring data redundancy, backup, and recovery strategies.
SQL Databases:
Expertise in administering SQL databases like MSSQL, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.
Perform database performance tuning, backups, restores, and patch management.
Implement and manage high-availability solutions for database environments.
Email & Collaboration Platforms:
Manage and support email systems, including Microsoft Exchange, Office 365, OneOffice, and FileCloud.
Ensure email system reliability, high availability, and disaster recovery strategies.
Email Security Management:
Manage and support Cisco Email Security solutions to safeguard against email-based threats.
Ensure compliance with email security best practices, including anti-spam, anti-malware, and phishing protection.
DNS Management:
Oversee DNS infrastructure using Infoblox for efficient and secure DNS management.
Ensure DNS security, including mitigation of DDoS attacks and unauthorized access.
DNS Security:
Implement and manage DNS security practices, including DNSSEC, anti-spoofing, and protection against DDoS attacks.
DNS Troubleshooting:
Resolve complex DNS issues, optimize configurations, and ensure seamless integration with internal and external systems.
Backup and Disaster Recovery Solutions:
Expertise in backup solutions, particularly Veeam and Commvault, for enterprise data protection.
Develop and execute disaster recovery plans to minimize downtime and data loss.
Monitor backup jobs, address issues promptly, and optimize storage usage and backup performance.
Server and Endpoint Security:
Manage and enhance security measures across servers and endpoints, including antivirus, intrusion detection, and prevention systems (IDS/IPS).
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify security weaknesses.
Patch and Vulnerability Management:
Ensure timely patching and management of software vulnerabilities across all platforms.
Implement and automate patch management processes to minimize exposure to threats.
Security, Monitoring, and Compliance:
Monitor systems for performance, availability, and security threats using advanced monitoring tools.
Ensure compliance with industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS) and company policies.
Work with ITSM solution for incidents and change management
log management and security incident response.
Network Security:
Preferred to have skills and good knowledge of network security infrastructure, including firewalls, intrusion prevention systems (IPS), and VPNs.
Understanding of network architectures to protect internal systems and data.
Load Balancers & High Availability:
Preferred to have skills and good knowledge on load balancing solutions to ensure high availability and scalability of services.
Preferred to have skills in technologies like F5, NGINX, or other load balancing solutions.
Cloud & Automation:
Good knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Develop and maintain scripts and automation workflows to streamline system management, backups, security patches, and other operational tasks using Ansible, PowerShell, Bash, or Python.
Containerization & Orchestration:
Good knowledge in containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
Preferred to have knowledge and skill on container orchestration systems to support microservices architectures.
Collaboration & Cross-Functional Support:
Cross-Team Collaboration: Work closely with other teams, including network engineers, security teams, and application teams, to ensure smooth operations and integration of digital platforms.
Training & Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for platform configurations, security policies, backup procedures, and troubleshooting steps. Train junior engineers and teams on best practices and system management.
Personal Skills
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to handle complex issues across multiple technologies.
Strong communication skills to collaborate effectively with internal teams and stakeholders.
Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Demonstrated leadership ability in guiding teams through complex technical challenges.
Technical Skills
7+ years of experience in IT operations, with a strong focus on Windows and Linux server administration, Virtualization, Storage solutions (SAN/NAS), and SQL databases (MSSQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL), backups, email and systems security, and platform management.
Extensive experience with backup solutions such as Commvault and Veeam for enterprise-level backup and disaster recovery management.
Hands-on experience managing Microsoft Exchange, Office 365, OneOffice, and FileCloud collaboration solution.
Proven experience in DNS management and security using Infoblox or similar DNS platforms.
Strong experience in email security technologies, particularly Cisco Email Security and knowledge of anti-spam, malware protection, and email threat mitigation.
Experience with security tools for compliance, including encryption, access controls, and DLP systems.
Experience with privilege access management software.
Strong understanding of server and endpoint security tools, vulnerability management, patching processes, and security protocols.
In-depth knowledge of network security tools, including firewalls, load balancers, VPNs, and intrusion prevention systems (IPS).
Proficient in network architecture, design, and security best practices.
Strong experience in monitoring, security operations, and compliance management.
Experience with SIEM, SOC, and incident response protocols.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (Openstack, AWS, Azure) and hybrid cloud environments is a plus.
Relevant certifications such as oMicrosoft Certified (Windows Server or Azure certifications)
oVMware Certified Professional (VCP)
o Linux Certified (RHCE, LPIC)
oCommvault Certified Engineer (CCE)
oVeeam Certified Engineer (VMCE)
o Infoblox Certified Expert (IFX) or related DNS certification
o Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) or Cisco Certified CyberOps Associate (for email security)
o CompTIA Security+, CISSP, or other relevant security certifications are highly preferred.
Education
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field.
Giza Systems

title: Senior Software Integration Engineer
description:
Advansys is a dynamic solutions provider focused on delivering smart, modular, and sustainable technology solutions that enhance operations, improve customer experiences, and drive business modernization. With over 400 skilled engineers, we serve 100+ enterprise customers across 14 countries. Specialized in a wide array of premium services including Business Automation, Industrial Digitization, Low code Development, Cloud Services, Warehouse Automation & Strategic Outsourcing.
Founded in 2014, Advansys is part of the INTRO Group, a private conglomerate established in 1980 with diverse investments across different business areas, oil and gas, real estate, specialized engineering, financial investment, Food & manufacturing.
We are seeking a Senior Software Developer to be a part of our Integration Team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust and scalable integration solutions between multiple systems. Your primary focus will be building and optimizing integration pipelines, working with Java-based applications, designing RESTful APIs, and leveraging SQL to handle large datasets. Additionally, you will be working in a Linux environment, ensuring seamless integration and smooth operations of interconnected systems.
Job description:
Develop and maintain integration solutions: Design, develop, and implement integration strategies to connect different systems and services effectively using Java and APIs.
API Development: Create and optimize RESTful APIs to enable smooth communication between systems, ensuring secure and efficient data transfer.
Database Management: Use SQL to design and optimize database queries, manage data, and ensure the integrity and performance of backend systems.
Linux Environment: Work with Linux servers to deploy and manage applications, troubleshooting and ensuring optimal system performance.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work closely with product managers, other developers, and system architects to understand integration requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
Performance Tuning: Continuously monitor the performance of integration solutions and optimize code and database queries for better performance.
Troubleshoot and debug: Identify and resolve technical issues across the integration stack, including backend services, APIs, and database queries.
Maintain documentation: Document integration processes, architecture, and codebase to ensure transparency and ease of maintenance.
Mentor junior developers: Provide guidance and support to junior developers, sharing best practices and helping with code reviews.
Requirements
Java: Proven experience in developing applications using Java and associated frameworks (Spring, Hibernate, etc.).
SQL: Strong experience with SQL to design, optimize, and manage databases and queries.
APIs: Hands-on experience in designing, developing, and integrating RESTful APIs.
Linux: Proficiency in Linux for deploying, managing, and troubleshooting applications and services.
Software Integration: Extensive experience in integrating various systems and services in complex environments.
Strong understanding of software design principles, architecture patterns, and best practices in software development.
Problem-solving: Excellent debugging, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.
Communication: Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and present technical information.
Advansys

Maintain documentation: Document integration processes, architecture, and codebase to ensure transparency and ease of maintenance.
Mentor junior developers: Provide guidance and support to junior developers, sharing best practices and helping with code reviews.
Requirements
Java: Proven experience in developing applications using Java and associated frameworks (Spring, Hibernate, etc.).
SQL: Strong experience with SQL to design, optimize, and manage databases and queries.
APIs: Hands-on experience in designing, developing, and integrating RESTful APIs.
Linux: Proficiency in Linux for deploying, managing, and troubleshooting applications and services.
Software Integration: Extensive experience in integrating various systems and services in complex environments.
Strong understanding of software design principles, architecture patterns, and best practices in software development.
Problem-solving: Excellent debugging, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.
Communication: Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and present technical information.
